module.name: furniture_interior_decoration
module.keywords: furniture catalog, shape representation, geometric models, surface conditions, geometric tolerances, dimensions, space, interior decoration project

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the data that identify and characterize products offered to market and of their components. This application module provides also specifications suitable for the representation of geometric models, surface conditions, geometric tolerances, dimensions that characterize the shape of product components as well as their spacial location in order to represent a decoration project.

inscope.li: product structure data: product management data, item definition structure, effectivity, classification, and specification control;
actually manufactured physical parts or products identified by their lot id or serial number or inventory number;

8 kinds of geometric model, including advanced boundary representation, faceted boundary representation, manifold surfaces with topology, geometrically bounded surface, geometrically bounded wireframe 2d and 3d geometry, wireframe with topology, and constructive solid geometry;
geometric validation properties, for the assessment of the quality of conversions that occur in a transfer of geometric data;
